description: Midway Scenario: US forces outnumbered, intelligence partial. Objective: Defend Midway.

intents.description: Maintain air superiority over Midway Atoll against IJN fleet.
Locate and strike IJN carriers while they are rearming.
Avoid direct battleship engagement; preserve US carriers.

description: Operation Market Garden: Secure bridges across the Rhine.

intents.description: Capture the road bridge at Arnhem with airborne troops.
Ground forces must reach Arnhem within 48 hours.
